predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple system atrophy (MSA)
2. Autosomal dominant nocturnal frontal lobe epilepsy (ADNFLE)
3. Familial dysautonomia (FD)
4. Hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type I (HSAN1)
5. Mitochondrial encephalomyopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes (MELAS)
6. Spinocerebellar ataxia (SCA)
7. Neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis (NCL)
8. Metabolic syndrome with autonomic neuropathy
9. Familial hemiplegic migraine (FHM)
10. Paroxysmal exercise-induced dyskinesia (PED).
